Class ApplicationController

java.lang.Object
bto.Controllers.ApplicationController
public class ApplicationController extends Object
The ApplicationController class manages BTO (Build-To-Order) housing project applications. This controller acts as a central management point for all application-related operations including submission, processing, status updates, and withdrawal requests.

It maintains a map of all applications indexed by applicant NRIC for fast retrieval and provides methods to interact with application entities across the system.

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicationController

      public ApplicationController()
      Default constructor for ApplicationController. Initializes an empty map to store applications.

  • Method Details

    • submitApplication

      public Boolean submitApplication(Applicant applicant, Project project)
      Submits a new application for an applicant to a specific project. Verifies that the applicant does not already have an active application.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant submitting the application
      project - The project being applied for
      Returns:
      true if the application was successfully submitted, false if the applicant already has an active application

    • processApplication

      public boolean processApplication(ProjectApplication application)
      Processes an application by checking flat availability and updating the application status. If units of the requested flat type are available, the application is marked as successful and the available units count is decreased.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to process
      Returns:
      true if the application was processed successfully with available units, false otherwise

    • updateApplicationStatus

      public boolean updateApplicationStatus(ProjectApplication application, ApplicationStatus status)
      Updates the status of an application.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to update
      status - The new status to set
      Returns:
      true if the status was updated successfully, false if the application is invalid

    • getApplicationByApplicantNRIC

      public ProjectApplication getApplicationByApplicantNRIC(String nric)
      Retrieves an application by the applicant's NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the applicant
      Returns:
      The ProjectApplication object if found, null otherwise

    • getApplicationsByProject

      public List<ProjectApplication> getApplicationsByProject(Project project)
      Retrieves all applications for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to filter applications for
      Returns:
      A list of applications for the specified project

    • getAllApplications

      public List<ProjectApplication> getAllApplications()
      Retrieves all applications in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all applications

    • requestWithdrawal

      public boolean requestWithdrawal(ProjectApplication application)
      Submits a withdrawal request for an application. Changes the withdrawal status to "PENDING" for manager approval.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to withdraw
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal request was submitted successfully, false if the application is invalid

    • approveWithdrawal

      public boolean approveWithdrawal(ProjectApplication application)
      Approves a withdrawal request for an application. If the application was successful and a flat was allocated, the flat is returned to the available pool.
      Parameters:
      application - The application with the withdrawal request
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal was approved successfully, false if the application is invalid or not in a PENDING withdrawal state

    • rejectWithdrawal

      public boolean rejectWithdrawal(ProjectApplication application)
      Rejects a withdrawal request for an application.
      Parameters:
      application - The application with the withdrawal request
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal was rejected successfully, false if the application is invalid or not in a PENDING withdrawal state

    • getApplications

      public Map<String,ProjectApplication> getApplications()
      Gets the map of all applications indexed by applicant NRIC.
      Returns:
      The map of NRIC to ProjectApplication

    • setApplications

      public void setApplications(List<ProjectApplication> applicationList)
      Sets the applications from a list of ProjectApplication objects. Clears the existing map and rebuilds it using the applicant NRIC as keys.
      Parameters:
      applicationList - The list of applications to set
